## attach

Tagged data constructor

### Examples

```javascript
attach('typeOfTag', data); // ('typeOfTag', data)
```

## typeTag

Get type of tagged data

### Examples

```javascript
const tag = attach('simpleTag', card);
typeTag(tag); // simpleTag
```

## contents

Get contents from tagged data

### Examples

```javascript
const tag = attach('complexTag', cons(1, 2));
contents(tag); // (1, 2)
```
